mapper.insert: insert into board(user_email, title, content, view_count, created_at, updated_at) values (#{email}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now(), null)
mapper.select: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id} RETURNING id, user_email, title, content, view_count, created_at, updated_at
SELECT id, user_email, title, content, view_count, created_at, updated_at FROM board WHERE user_email = #{email} ORDER BY created_at DESC
